response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. Given its exceptional quality and features, it's valued at $150 by many customers like yourself. I'm confident it will meet and exceed your expectations. Considering its worth, I'm extending an exclusive offer to you at a special price of $120. This is a fantastic opportunity to acquire a high-value item at a discounted rate. I look forward to hearing your decision soon.", "product_price": 120}
